sql: SELECT    fa.receivedate,     fa.typecode     INTO    :applicationRecievedDate,    :programCode   FROM    caseheader              ch    INNER JOIN bdmforeignapplication   fa ON ch.caseid = fa.caseid                                           AND ch.casetypecode = 'CT5'                                           AND ch.statuscode = 'CS4'                                           AND ( fa.typecode = 'FATYP01'                                                 OR fa.typecode = 'FATYP03' OR fa.typecode = 'FATYP53' OR fa.typecode = 'FATYP54')                                            AND fa.status <> 'FASTTS04' AND fa.recordstatus = 'RST1'    WHERE     ch.concernroleid = :concernRoleID
adhocSQL: SELECT    cr.concernroleid,    cr.concernroleid,    cr.concernroleid    INTO    :clientconcernroleid,    :concernroleid,    :torecipientconcernroleid  FROM    concernrole             cr    INNER JOIN caseheader              ch ON ch.concernroleid = cr.concernroleid    INNER JOIN bdmforeignapplication   fa ON ch.caseid = fa.caseid WHERE    NOT EXISTS    (        SELECT            1        FROM            bdmcorrespondencestaging        WHERE           clientconcernroleid = cr.concernroleid            AND templatename = 'ISP-SAMPLE_WITH_ADHOC_SQL'                AND TRUNC(dateforsending) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)    )
